quickstart.description: Send your first email in under 5 minutes.

api_keys.description: Create and manage secure API keys.

email_api.title: Email API

section_one.headline: Build, send, and manage emails with confidence.
section_one.description: Powerful APIs, modern SDKs, and real-time insights designed to integrate seamlessly into your workflow and scale effortlessly as your product grows, giving you the reliability, performance, and control needed to build, automate, and deliver emails with confidence at any stage of your application's journey.

section_two.headline: Developer-first SDK flows for Eleventeen
section_two.description: Pick a language and action to generate ready-to-use Eleventeen snippets for sending emails, creating domains, and provisioning API keys.
section_two.mobile_description: Pick a language and action to instantly generate Eleventeen snippets for sending emails, managing domains, and creating API keys.

section_four.headline: Trusted by leading developers and enterprises

section_five.headline: A comprehensive dashboard for modern email delivery
section_five.description: Build, test, and monitor transactional email from one place. Our app is designed for developers with clear logs, delivery insights, environment-based configuration, and an API-first workflow that ships faster.

cards.visibility_description: Track sends, bounces, opens, and failures in a single dashboard so your team can debug faster and keep communication reliable.
cards.compose_title: Familiar compose UI for faster testing
cards.compose_description: Preview and send emails in a common compose experience with from, to, and subject fields. Developers can validate formatting, content, and sending behavior before going live.

mock_email.title: New Message
mock_email.subject: Subject
mock_email.body:
Hi Mohammed,
Welcome aboard. Your SMTP domain is verified and your first test email was delivered successfully.

section_six.headline: Ready to ship reliable email infrastructure for your product?
section_six.description: Set up domains, generate API keys, monitor delivery events, and scale from first send to millions of messages with a workflow that feels native to developers.

latest_api_request.label: Latest API request
latest_api_request.payload:
POST /v1/emails/send
from: alerts@acme.dev
to: user@product.com
status: 202 accepted

section_seven.headline: From zero setup to production-ready email in one sprint
section_seven.description: This workflow helps developer teams launch quickly without sacrificing observability, security, or deliverability.

day_1.title: Connect your domain
day_1.description: Add DNS records and verify SPF, DKIM, and DMARC with guided checks.

day_3.title: Integrate API and SMTP
day_3.description: Ship transactional flows fast with SDK snippets and environment keys.

day_7.title: Go live with confidence
day_7.description: Enable webhooks, alerting, and replay tools for production stability.

section_eight.headline: Start sending production email today
section_eight.description: Build faster with developer-first APIs, real-time delivery insights, and infrastructure you can rely on.

footer.description: Developer-first email platform for sending, monitoring, and scaling transactional communication.
footer.tagline: Built for developers, designed for reliable delivery.
